amendment.description: Amendment sought to sunset the 2001 AUMF effective 12 months from date of enactment of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 21 printed in House Rept. 113-460 to sunset the 2001 AUMF effective 12 months from date of enactment of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schiff amendment (A017) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 233 (Roll no. 237).
